ygData.subject: Re: Riposte Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry no idea, dont have the skill.  That WOULD be nice skill, deflecting the damage back onto the attacker...
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry no idea, dont have the skill. That WOULD be nice skill, deflecting
the damage back onto the attacker...

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:coanj@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:09 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Riposte Skill
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <coanj@...>
>
> Reposte is a counter attack you get upon a successful parry, based upon
> skill. I've got it, but I'm not sure if the reposte attack is my damage,
> or
> if it actually turns the mobs damage against him....ie, Zealot hits me for
> 74, I reposte, do I do 74 points of damage, or the damage that my weapon
> can
> do?
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:56 PM
> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Riposte Skill
> >
> >
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > Riposte traditionally is to counterattack after a parry (fencing term).
> I
> > GUESS thats what it would be in the game as well...
> >
> > Jaade,
> > Indigo Sista Soldier.
> >
> > > ----------
